file.title: AMM PART II-1285 - CHAPTER 26-14-02-04 - CONFIG-2 - SMOKE DETECTOR PANEL - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION

page.data: AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL SMOKE DETECTOR PANEL - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION EFFECTIVITY: ACFT MODEL(S) EMB-135 1. General A. This section gives the procedures for the removal/installation of the windscreen smoke-detector panel. B. The windscreen smoke-detector panel is installed in the windscreen section of the passenger cabin, zone 232. C. The procedures in this section are given in the sequence below. The tasks identified with ( ♦) are part of the Scheduled Maintenance Requirements Document (SMRD). TASK NUMBER DESCRIPTION EFFECTIVITY ACFT MODEL(S) WINDSCREEN SMOKE-DETECTOR PAN- 26-14-02-000-802-A EMB-135 EL - REMOVAL ACFT MODEL(S) WINDSCREEN SMOKE-DETECTOR PAN- 26-14-02-400-802-A EMB-135 EL - INSTALLATION EMB-145 - AMM 1285 General CONFIG-2 26-14-02 Page 1 of 4 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 26-14-02-000-802-A EFFECTIVITY: ACFT MODEL(S) EMB-135 2. WINDSCREEN SMOKE-DETECTOR PANEL - REMOVAL A. General (1) This task gives the procedures for the removal of the windscreen smoke-detector panel. B. Zones and Accesses Not Applicable C. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable D. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable E. Consumable Materials Not Applicable F. Expandable Parts Not Applicable G. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Passenger cabin H. Preparation SUBTASK 841-006-B (1) On the circuit breaker panel, open the "LAVATORY SMOKE DET" circuit breaker, and attach a "DO-NOT-CLOSE" tag to it. I. Removal (Figure 401) SUBTASK 020-008-B (1) Remove the screws (1). (2) Remove the smoke detector panel (2) from the windscreen. (3) Remove the electrical connector (3). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-802-A/400 CONFIG-2 26-14-02 Page 2 of 4 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL EFFECTIVITY: ACFT MODEL(S) EMB-135 Windscreen Smoke-Detector Panel - Removal/Installation Figure 401 A SMOKE DETECTOR B TEST HORN RESET SMOKE DETECTOR PANEL DET. A WINDSCREEN 3. CONNECTOR 1. SCREW 2. SMOKE DETECTOR PANEL DET. B 145AMM260125.MCE EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-802-A/400 CONFIG-2 26-14-02 Page 3 of 4 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 26-14-02-400-802-A EFFECTIVITY: ACFT MODEL(S) EMB-135 3. WINDSCREEN SMOKE-DETECTOR PANEL - INSTALLATION A. General (1) This task gives the procedures for the installation of the windscreen smoke-detector panel. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM TASK 26-14-00-700-802-A/500 - C. Zones and Accesses Not Applicable D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Passenger cabin I. Installation (Figure 401) SUBTASK 420-008-B (1) Install the electrical connector (3). (2) Install the smoke detector panel (2) on the windscreen. (3) Install the screws (1). J. Follow-on SUBTASK 842-006-B (1) Remove the "DO-NOT-CLOSE" tag and close the "LAVATORY SMOKE DET" circuit breaker. (2) Do the Operational Check of the Lavatory Smoke-Detection System (AMM TASK 26-14-00-700-802-A/500).
